products.name: Classic Sneakers
products.description: Comfortable everyday sneakers with a modern design.

products.name: Hoodie
products.description: Elevate your casual wardrobe with the vibrant Nike Tech Fleece Hoodie in bold orange, designed for both style and comfort. Crafted with premium soft-touch fabric, this hoodie offers lightweight warmth without the bulk, making it perfect for layering or wearing solo on chilly days. The bright orange hue adds a pop of color to your outfit, ensuring you stand out while staying cozy.

products.name: Wireless Headphones
products.description: Noise-cancelling wireless headphones with 20 hours battery life.

products.name: Washing Machine
products.description: A high-efficiency washing machine designed to save water and energy while delivering powerful cleaning. Features multiple wash cycles, quick wash options, and a sleek modern design for everyday convenience.
